cards.title: Lady Of The Wood
powers: Select a damage type. {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 1 damage of the chosen type.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a damage type. Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt of the chosen type by 1.
1 hero may discard a card to regain 3 HP.

openingLines.CeladrochCharacter: I haven't felt this presence in many years. Beware, my friends. This wind carries the scent of death.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: If we do not stop her, she will bring ruin upon all these lands!

cards.title: Calm Before the Storm
body: Increase the next damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by X, where X is 2 plus the number of cards discarded this way.

flavorQuotes.text: The Lady's holding back.{BR}I need her to not.
On her turf, on her terms.

cards.title: Fire in the Clouds
cards.body: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 3 fire damage or up to 3 targets 1 lightning damage each.

cards.title: Meadow Rush
body: Search your deck for a season card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorReference: The Dreamer, Perchance to Dream One Shot

cards.title: Nobility of Dusk
cards.body: Once per turn when {LadyOfTheWood} would deal damage you may increase that damage by 2.

cards.title: Rebirth
body: When this card enters play, put up to 3 cards from your trash beneath it.
Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} destroys a target, put a card from beneath this one into your hand.
When there are no cards beneath this one, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Wielding the old magic has left me{BR}hollow. But she [b]IS[/b] the old magic.

cards.title: Serenity of Dawn
body: At the end of your turn, if {LadyOfTheWood} dealt no damage this turn, she regains 2 HP and you may draw a card.
If {LadyOfTheWood} deals 3 or more damage to a target, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: This is how I will{BR}always remember her.

cards.title: Crown of the Four Winds
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals one target 1 toxic damage, a second target 1 fire damage, a third target 1 lightning damage, and a fourth target 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Whatever direction you run, your{BR}destination will be the same.

cards.flavorReference: Tempest, Temple of the Four Winds #2

cards.title: Fall
cards.body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals lightning damage to a target, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
cards.flavorText: Lightning is the exclamation mark{BR}to every sentence autumn speaks.

cards.title: Frost on the Petals
cards.body: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 3 toxic damage or up to 3 targets 1 cold damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: On what planet does{BR}winter follow spring?

cards.title: Rainpetal Cloak
body: The first time {LadyOfTheWood} would be dealt 1 damage each turn, she regains 1 HP instead.

flavorQuotes.text: It is raining! Dance with me!

cards.flavorReference: Lady Of The Wood, The Wanderer's Requiem #146

cards.title: Snowshade Gown
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} regains HP, you may select a target that hasn't been dealt damage this turn. {LadyOfTheWood} deals that target 1 cold damage.

cards.title: Spring
cards.body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals toxic damage to a target, she regains that much HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Nature doesn't believe in second{BR}chances. After all, why stop at two?

cards.flavorReference: The Scholar, A King Among Fools #10

cards.title: Summer
cards.body: Increase fire damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: You should all cover your eyes.

cards.title: Suncast Mantle
body: Increase damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by 3 as long as her HP is 5 or less.
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals herself 1 fire damage and 1 target 4 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She's keepin' this whole place alive,{BR}and it's killin' her. She's spread herself{BR}too thin.

cards.title: Thundergrey Shawl
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals 2 or less damage to a target, that damage is irreducible.
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals up to 2 targets 1 lightning damage each.

cards.title: Winter
cards.body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals cold damage to a target, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: “It's awful quiet.”{BR}“It is the silence of an indrawn breath.{BR}Just wait.”
cards.flavorReference: Starlight And Lady Of The Wood, Starcrossed #72

promoCards.title: Lady Of The Wood
promoCards.promoTitle: Lady of the Wood: Season of Change
powers: Discard a card. You may play a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard their hand and draw the same number of cards.
All damage dealt is irreducible until the start of your turn.

openingLines.default: The turn of the seasons will wipe this land clean of evil.
openingLines.CeladrochCharacter: Hurry, everyone! His bonds are weakening - but ours can strengthen!
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Poor beast. She has become an abomination, unable to rest, driven by cruelty.

promoCards.title: Lady Of The Wood
promoCards.promoTitle: Ministry Of Strategic Science Lady of the Wood
powers: Add 2 tokens to your element pool. When {LadyOfTheWood} would deal damage, you may change its type by spending a token.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
Add 1 token to your element pool.
Spend 1 token from your element pool. If you do, 1 hero deals 1 target 3 damage of any type.

openingLines.default: We have formed a most excellent team to deal with your misdeeds.
openingLines.CeladrochCharacter: Adventure, discovery, life - all will exist after this. All but you, Celadroch.
openingLines.MythosCharacter: Your voice is almost familiar to me, but...its owner was lost, long ago.
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: Come, friends. We must deal with a dragon.

tokenPools.name: Lady of the Wood's Element Pool

promoCards.title: Lady Of The Wood
powers: Destroy a season. Play a season and change the next damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} to a type listed on it. You may use a power.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One target deals itself 1 cold damage.
Select 1 of your season cards, its text affects all heroes until your next turn.

openingLines.default: I have seen millenia slip away; as will your chance at victory.
openingLines.CeladrochCharacter: It seems like not all things have changed, after all - is your evil timeless, Celadroch, or were you waiting for me?
openingLines.HydraWinterTiamatCharacter: You are indeed ancient and terrible. Almost as much as I am.
openingLines.FutureTiamatCharacter: This mockery of the great beast makes me sad. Let us end this.
